item.description:
Join Mo' at RiRa for late night fun and dancing at RiRa!!!!!

This place is absolutely the place to be on a Friday night! I went last Saturday to this amazing place with a friend and it was simply FANTASTIC! Great food, not expensive, and the music absolutely rocks!

 

Check their website: http://www.rira.com/providence/ri-ra-late-night.html

 

Friday night DJ:

DJ Vezzy Parmesan from HOT 106 will be on stage spinning the latest and hottest tracks while you dance the night away!!!

DJ Vezzy will be given full access to their state of the art lighting system. Paired with his skills, Friday nights at RiRa are the hottest in RI!

http://www.rira.com/providence/ri-ra-late-night.html

Ladies get in free ALL NIGHT LONG!!! Beer and Drink specials all night!

 

I will send you my contact details Friday's morning!
item.how_to_find_us: Mo is hosting this one, please look at his picture!!!!
item.name: RiRa Late Night with Mo
